description.zh: Isso 是一个用 Python 和 JavaScript 编写的轻量级评论服务器，旨在作为 Disqus 的替代方案。它提供了一种简单的方式，通过最小的配置即可为网站添加评论功能。该项目强调简洁性、隐私保护和易于集成。
description.en: Isso is a lightweight commenting server written in Python and JavaScript, designed as a drop-in replacement for Disqus. It provides a simple way to add comment functionality to websites with minimal setup. The project emphasizes simplicity, privacy, and ease of integration.

feature.zh:
## 产品优势:

- 轻量级设计，易于部署
- 强调用户隐私，无外部追踪
- 支持从 Disqus 和 WordPress 简单迁移

## 功能列表:

- 支持 Markdown 格式的评论
- 用户可在设定时间内编辑或删除自己的评论
- 评论需经审核后才对公众可见
- 内置 SQLite 数据库，简化数据管理
- 通过单一小型 JavaScript 文件（65KB / 压缩后 20KB）实现轻松集成
- 支持 Docker 部署，并提供稳定版本标签
- 开源项目，采用 MIT 许可证，社区活跃
feature.en:
## Benefits:

- Lightweight and easy to deploy
- Prioritizes user privacy with no external tracking
- Simple migration from Disqus and WordPress

## Features:

- Support for Markdown-formatted comments
- Users can edit or delete their own comments within a configurable time window
- Comments require moderation before becoming publicly visible
- Built-in SQLite backend for simplicity and performance
- Easy integration via a single, small JavaScript file (65kB / 20kB gzipped)
- Supports Docker deployment with stable release tags
- Open source with MIT license and active community support
